# idsec_identity_role (Resource)

The Identity service role resource that is used to manage roles.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "idsec_identity_role" "myrole" {
  role_name   = "myrole"
  description = "An example role created"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role_name` (String) Role name to create

### Optional

- `admin_rights` (List of String) Admin rights to add to the role
- `description` (String) Description of the role
- `role_id` (String) Role id to update
